newPatientsHbb.query: SELECT COUNT(uuid) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(registration_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(registration_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(registration_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM patient WHERE registration_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND registration_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND renewal = 0 AND project_id = 1 GROUP BY period;

newPatientsPax.query: SELECT COUNT(uuid) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(registration_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(registration_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(registration_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM patient WHERE registration_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND registration_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND renewal = 0 AND project_id = 2 GROUP BY period;

returningPatientsHbb.query: SELECT COUNT(uuid) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(registration_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(registration_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(registration_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM patient WHERE registration_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND registration_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND renewal = 1 AND project_id = 1 GROUP BY period;

returningPatientsPax.query: SELECT COUNT(uuid) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(registration_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(registration_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(registration_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM patient WHERE registration_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND registration_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND renewal = 1 AND project_id = 2 GROUP BY period;

newFicheSalesHbb.query: SELECT COUNT(sale.uuid) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(sale.invoice_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(sale.invoice_Date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(sale.invoice_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM sale join sale_item where sale_item.sale_uuid = sale.uuid AND sale_item.inventory_uuid = (SELECT uuid from inventory where code = 020002) AND sale.invoice_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND sale.invoice_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND sale.project_id = 1 AND sale.uuid NOT IN (SELECT sale_uuid FROM credit_note) GROUP BY period;

newFicheSalesPax.query: SELECT COUNT(sale.uuid) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(sale.invoice_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(sale.invoice_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(sale.invoice_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM sale join sale_item where sale_item.sale_uuid = sale.uuid AND sale_item.inventory_uuid = (SELECT uuid from inventory where code = 020002) AND sale.invoice_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND sale.invoice_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND sale.project_id = 2 AND sale.uuid NOT IN (SELECT sale_uuid FROM credit_note) GROUP BY period;

oldFicheSalesHbb.query: SELECT COUNT(sale.uuid) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(sale.invoice_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(sale.invoice_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(sale.invoice_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM sale join sale_item where sale_item.sale_uuid = sale.uuid AND sale_item.inventory_uuid = (SELECT uuid from inventory where code = 020003) AND sale.invoice_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND sale.invoice_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND sale.project_id = 1 AND sale.uuid NOT IN (SELECT sale_uuid FROM credit_note) GROUP BY period;

oldFicheSalesPax.query: SELECT COUNT(sale.uuid) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(sale.invoice_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(sale.invoice_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(sale.invoice_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM sale join sale_item where sale_item.sale_uuid = sale.uuid AND sale_item.inventory_uuid = (SELECT uuid from inventory where code = 020003) AND sale.invoice_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND sale.invoice_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND sale.project_id = 2 AND sale.uuid NOT IN (SELECT sale_uuid FROM credit_note) GROUP BY period;

totalSalesHbb.query: SELECT COUNT(uuid) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(sale.invoice_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(sale.invoice_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(sale.invoice_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM sale WHERE invoice_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND invoice_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND sale.project_id = 1 AND sale.uuid NOT IN (SELECT sale_uuid FROM credit_note) GROUP BY period;

totalSalesPax.query: SELECT COUNT(uuid) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(invoice_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(invoice_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(invoice_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM sale WHERE invoice_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND invoice_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND sale.project_id = 2 AND sale.uuid NOT IN (SELECT sale_uuid FROM credit_note) GROUP BY period;

auxCashHbb.query: SELECT SUM(if(currency_id = 2, cost * 930, cost )) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM cash WHERE  project_id = 1 AND date>={{ this.date.from }} AND date<={{ this.date.to }} AND uuid NOT IN (SELECT cash_uuid FROM cash_discard) GROUP BY period;

auxCashPax.query: SELECT SUM(if(currency_id = 2, cost * 930, cost )) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM cash WHERE  project_id = 2 AND date>={{ this.date.from }} AND date<={{ this.date.to }} AND uuid NOT IN (SELECT cash_uuid FROM cash_discard) GROUP BY period;

auxCashTotalInvoiceHbb.query: SELECT COUNT(invoice_uuid) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM cash join cash_item where cash_item.cash_uuid = cash.uuid AND date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND project_id = 1 GROUP BY period;

auxCashTotalInvoicePax.query: SELECT COUNT(invoice_uuid) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM cash join cash_item where cash_item.cash_uuid = cash.uuid AND date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND project_id = 2 GROUP BY period;

transfer.query: SELECT SUM(debit_equiv) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(trans_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(trans_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(trans_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM (SELECT p.debit_equiv, p.trans_date FROM posting_journal as p WHERE p.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND p.trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND p.trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND origin_id = 10 UNION ALL SELECT g.debit_equiv, g.trans_date FROM general_ledger as g WHERE g.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND g.trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND g.trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND origin_id = 10) as t GROUP BY period;

convention.query: SELECT SUM(debit_equiv) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(trans_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(trans_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(trans_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM (SELECT p.debit_equiv, p.trans_date FROM posting_journal as p WHERE p.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND p.trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND p.trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND origin_id = 8 UNION ALL SELECT g.debit_equiv, g.trans_date FROM general_ledger as g WHERE g.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND g.trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND g.trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND origin_id = 8) as t GROUP BY period;

chargeTaken.query: SELECT SUM(debit_equiv) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(trans_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(trans_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(trans_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM (SELECT p.debit_equiv, p.trans_date FROM posting_journal as p WHERE p.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND p.trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND p.trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND origin_id = 5 UNION ALL SELECT g.debit_equiv, g.trans_date FROM general_ledger as g WHERE g.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND g.trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND g.trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND origin_id = 5) as t GROUP BY period;

genericIncome.query: SELECT SUM(debit_equiv) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(trans_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(trans_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(trans_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM (SELECT p.debit_equiv, p.trans_date FROM posting_journal as p WHERE p.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND p.trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND p.trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND origin_id = 11 UNION ALL SELECT g.debit_equiv, g.trans_date FROM general_ledger as g WHERE g.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND g.trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND g.trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND origin_id = 11) as t GROUP BY period;

purchase.query: SELECT SUM(credit_equiv) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(trans_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(trans_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(trans_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM (SELECT p.credit_equiv, p.trans_date FROM posting_journal as p WHERE p.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND p.trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND p.trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND origin_id = 3 UNION ALL SELECT g.credit_equiv, g.trans_date FROM general_ledger as g WHERE g.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND g.trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND g.trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND origin_id = 3) as t GROUP BY period;

reversing.query: SELECT SUM(credit_equiv) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(trans_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(trans_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(trans_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM (SELECT p.credit_equiv, p.trans_date FROM posting_journal as p WHERE p.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND p.trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND p.trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND origin_id = 28 UNION ALL SELECT g.credit_equiv, g.trans_date FROM general_ledger as g WHERE g.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND g.trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND g.trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND origin_id = 28) as t GROUP BY period;

payroll.query: SELECT SUM(credit_equiv) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(trans_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(trans_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(trans_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM (SELECT p.credit_equiv, p.trans_date FROM posting_journal as p WHERE p.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND p.trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND p.trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND origin_id = 14 UNION ALL SELECT g.credit_equiv, g.trans_date FROM general_ledger as g WHERE g.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND g.trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND g.trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND origin_id = 14) as t GROUP BY period;

genericExpense.query: SELECT SUM(credit_equiv) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(trans_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(trans_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(trans_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM (SELECT p.credit_equiv, p.trans_date FROM posting_journal as p WHERE p.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND p.trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND p.trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND origin_id = 20 UNION ALL SELECT g.credit_equiv, g.trans_date FROM general_ledger as g WHERE g.account_id IN (2935, 2939) AND g.trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND g.trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} AND origin_id = 20) as t GROUP BY period;

subsidyIma.query: SELECT SUM(t.debit_equiv - t.credit_equiv) as "total", CONCAT('week_', WEEK(t.trans_date, 5) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(t.trans_date, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(t.trans_date) - 1 DAY), 5) + 1 ) as period FROM (SELECT p.debit_equiv, p.credit_equiv, p.trans_date FROM posting_journal as p WHERE p.account_id = 3551 AND trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }} UNION ALL SELECT g.debit_equiv, g.credit_equiv, g.trans_date FROM general_ledger as g WHERE g.account_id = 3551 AND trans_date >= {{ this.date.from }} AND trans_date <= {{ this.date.to }}) as t GROUP BY period;
